body: How subscribers do you need to be youtuber rank?
body_tagged: How subscribers do you need to be youtuber rank?
title: Youtuber!

replies.body:
That's only half of a 100 thousand....

but it I think VIP is 5,000 subs and 50,000 is Youtuber

replies.body:
To be a YouTuber for avicus you need more than 1,000 subs.
But you need to be posting regularly and the staff decide whether to add you or not.
replies.body_tagged:
To be a YouTuber for avicus you need more than 1,000 subs.
But you need to be posting regularly and the staff decide whether to add you or not.

replies.body:
Thats a bit low...
I heard there was some catch where you had to upload 3 videos a week of avicus, that put somebody I know off.

replies.body: It is low, however the staff choose whether the channel is capable of this. Also, that is true, you need to do 3 during the first 2 weeks on Avicus preferably in order to keep the rank. You can call this a Jr-YouTube rank if you wish xD
